Package data

Class Media

java.lang.Object
data.Media
Direct Known Subclasses:
Anime, Manga
public abstract class Media extends Object
Defines a generic Media object with fields that are common between all entry types planned for the log project, including Anime, Manga, etc...
Author:
Hunter Pruitt

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Media.MediaType
    Indicates which type of media is involved, useful for when the class isn't visible and certain checks/behaviour need to be involved.
    static enum 
    Media.Type
    Indicates whether the content is a series, or a special.

  • Field Details

    • ILLEGAL_SUBSTRING_EXCEPTION

      public static final String ILLEGAL_SUBSTRING_EXCEPTION
      Message for exceptions thrown that contain illegal substrings
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Media

      public Media(String title, int year, int count, Media.Type type, boolean finished, boolean dropped, String notes)
      Constructor for an Media object, sets fields shared by Anime, Manga, etc.
      Parameters:
      title - name of entry
      year - release year for first piece of content
      count - number consumed
      type - series or special
      finished - if the user finished with the entry
      dropped - if the user stopped watching / reading the entry
      notes - personal notes about the entry
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if passed bad parameters

  • Method Details

    • sortsBeforeTitleFocus

      public boolean sortsBeforeTitleFocus(Media otherMedia)
      Compares two media for sorting using alphabetical order (and year if both titles match) This method indicates if this media precedes the other. Sorting is not case-sensitive and numbers/symbols come before letters
      Parameters:
      otherMedia - Media to be compared to
      Returns:
      boolean indicator of if this Media comes before the parameter Media
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if passed a Media identical to this

    • sortsBeforeYearFocus

      public boolean sortsBeforeYearFocus(Media otherMedia)
      Alternate sorting based method. Indicates if this Media precedes the Media parameter based on year comparison and then alphabetical precedence.
      Parameters:
      otherMedia - Media to be compared against
      Returns:
      boolean indicator of if this Media comes before the parameter Media
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if passed a Media identical to this

      public void setYear(int year)
      Sets the release year of the Media
      Parameters:
      year - the year to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if year is not between 1900 and 2100

    • isValidString

      public boolean isValidString(String s)
      Indicates if the string used for any field stored as text contains illegal substrings, i.e., strings that are also used in DataIO to parse data.
      Parameters:
      s - String to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean indicator of if a String is acceptable
